description: Armor for the kind of conditions you dream about, the Sky Ridge™ GORE-TEX® Jacket features 2-layer GORE-TEX® waterproof breathable shell fabric and a fully dialed feature set for the deepest days of the season and beyond. Pair it with one of Mountain Hardwear's lightweight insulated layers for colder mornings on the mountain and wear on its own for continued comfort throughout your ride.
name: Mountain Hardwear Sky Ridge GTX Jacket - Mens
